record.id: field.name="suggestion.action" and file.name="smartsearchaction" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: suggestion.action
record.file.name: smartsearchaction

brief.brief: The script will be execute when Smart Search Action was clicked

detail.detail: It will overwrite "Default Action To Perform", it allow you to do fine control on different context
Some RAD variable can be used during evaluation
$L.assoc.file: Suggested record (only available when suggested record are Service Manager record). It can be null when suggested record is external document, like web page, SharePoint document.
$L.library: Knowledgebase Library record (SCFile : kmknowledgebase). The suggested document stays in
$L.reference: The unique ID used to identify the suggested document in IDOL server
